xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.14 Hetuduka, Hīnattika » 1.14.2 Majjhimapada » 1.14.2.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Hīnattika
Majjhimapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
419.
907Hetu majjhimo dhammo hetussa majjhimassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
420.
908Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
909Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
910Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
911(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetvādiup1.14.3 Paṇītapada >>
